column4: hello. im having troubles with ati drivers. i have an ati x200 and when i install the driver following the wiki instructions i cant use gnome anymore. I reboot and get the login screen but the laptop just freeze after typing my password. it starts to show that gnome splash kinda fuzzy and freezy. i can use gnome by commenting out the Load

hello. im having troubles with ati drivers. i have an ati x200 and when i install the driver following the wiki instructions i cant use gnome anymore. I reboot and get the login screen but the laptop just freeze after typing my password. it starts to show that gnome splash kinda fuzzy and freezy. i can use gnome by commenting out the Load "dri" at xorg.conf. What could be happening?
might want to join #ubuntu-br as it might be easier for you ;)
i tried to get help there yesterday. they couldnt help me :(
